locale.name: tr_TR
locale.message: Genel Belirleyici XML Eklentisi
Genel belirleyici ithal ve ihracı

Usage: {$scriptName} {$pluginName} [command] ... Commands: import [xmlFileName] [journal_path] [user_name] export [xmlFileName] [journal_path] issues [issueId1] [issueId2] ... export [xmlFileName] [journal_path] issue [issueId]
Genel belirleyici ihracı
Genel belirleyici ihracı
Sayı Seç
Please select issues, for whose objects you whish to export the public identifiers.
GEnel Belirleyicileri Al
This plugin supports the import of the public identifiers based on the pubIds.dtd Document Type Definition.
Sonuçları Al
Veri Alma Hatası
One or more errors occurred during import. Please check to ensure that the format of the import file correctly matches the specification. Specific details of the import errors are listed below.
Veri Alma Başarılı
Aşağıda listelenen genel belirleyiciler başarılı bir şekilde alındı.
HATA:
"{$journalPath}" adlı belirli dergi yolu açık değil.
"{$userName}" adlı belirli üye açık değil.
Belirli sayı numarası "{$issueId}" ile herhangi bir sayı eşlenemedi.
"{$fileName}" dosyasına yazılamadı.
The upload failed; please ensure that uploads are allowed on your server and that the file is not too big for your PHP and web server configuration.
This plugin does not support the supplied root node "{$rootName}". Please ensure that the file is correctly formed and try again.
An unknown object type "{$pubObjectType}" was specified in the "pubObjectType" attribute of the element with the value "{$pubId}".
The object "{$pubObjectType}" with ID = {$pubObjectId} specified in the element with the value "{$pubId}" deos not exist for this journal.
Public identifier of the type "{$pubIdType}" for the object {$pubObjectType} with ID = {$pubObjectId} already exists.
The public identifier "{$pubId}" is already in use by another object.
Your import file contains a public identifier type "{$pubIdType}" that no pubId plugin can handle. Please install and/or activate the corresponding pubId plugin before trying to import this dataset.
